game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: You've heard rumors of a mysterious artifact buried within a forgotten ruin. Your quest is to locate and retrieve it, facing whatever challenges may lie ahead.
game.reward: 1000 experience points and a rare magical item

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: Talk to villagers in the nearby town and gather information about the location of the ruins.
Navigate through the ancient ruins, avoiding or disarming deadly traps set to protect the artifact.
Defeat the magical guardian that protects the artifact, proving your worth to claim it.
